definition: of a moderate yellow-green color that is greener and deeper than moss green and yellower and darker than pea green, cresses that grow in clear ponds and streams
details:
adjective
- of a moderate yellow-green color that is greener and deeper than moss green and yellower and darker than pea green
= synonyms: cress green
noun
- cresses that grow in clear ponds and streams
- any of several water-loving cresses
